#summary Notepad - yet another version of Google's tutorial app.

= Introduction =

Notepad is a simple, easy-to-use note-taking app which is based on Google's tutorial  [http://developer.android.com/resources/tutorials/notepad/index.html NotePad] app.

This version has a preference to set text size, to search, the ability to send the note and optional delete confirmation.

The notes have a context menu accessed by long-pressing the note title in the list view, and most screens have an options menu accessed by pressing the 'Menu' button on your Android device.
